definition: next in sequence/second/the second (day, time etc)/secondary/vice-/sub-/infra-/inferior quality/substandard/order/sequence/hypo- (chemistry)/classifier for enumerated events: time
abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan

sentences.english: At 10 a. m. next day, Secretary-general Yao Haitao met Ms.
sentences.chinese: 次日上午10時，姚海濤祕書長親切會見了陸潔女士。

sentences.english: And we sailed thence, and came the next day over against Chios;
sentences.chinese: 從那裏開船，次日到了基阿的對面。

sentences.english: The day after the misinformed spokesman made the announcements he had to take them all back.
sentences.chinese: 發言人誤報消息的次日，他必須撤回所有的消息。

sentences.english: The next day morning, the professor would be surprised to open the door.
sentences.chinese: 次日一早，教授打開屋門便大喫一驚。

sentences.english: 15The next day we set sail from there and arrived off Kios.
sentences.chinese: 從那裏開船，次日到了基阿的對面。

sentences.english: The next day the people of Shechem went out to the fields, and this was reported to Abimelech.
sentences.chinese: 次日，民出到田間，有人告訴亞比米勒。

sentences.english: It rained on the day we arrived,but the following day was sunny.
sentences.chinese: 我們到達的那天正在下雨，但次日天氣晴朗。

sentences.english: But God prepared a worm when the morning rose the next day, and it smote the gourd that it withered.
sentences.chinese: 次日黎明，神卻安排一條蟲子咬這蓖麻，以致枯槁。

sentences.english: THE appearance of the island when I came on deck next morning was altogether changed.
sentences.chinese: 次日清晨，我走上甲板一看，那個島完全變了樣。

sentences.english: He don't break his promise and sends back the prince to enemy's camp next day.
sentences.chinese: 胡將軍沒有食言，次日便將太子送回敵營。

sentences.english: The next day a Verd drove up, and created the sentence.
sentences.chinese: 次日，一位動詞駕車趕來，創造了句子。

sentences.english: It was in the lower field next day,poisoning.
sentences.chinese: 次日在較低的田裏放毒。

sentences.english: Next Day Delivery is available on orders placed before 12 noon EST Monday thru Friday.
sentences.chinese: 次日交貨至週五美東時間週一中午12點之前的訂單。

sentences.english: A red sky evening indicingesteds fine weather the following day.
sentences.chinese: 晚上天邊有紅雲就表示次日天氣會很晴朗。

sentences.english: The next morning, with the sound of firecrackers, the dock gate closure ceremony was held.
sentences.chinese: 次日上午，在炮竹聲中，塢門合攏儀式正式舉行。

sentences.english: When Feng Sun to return to the store, is already the next day 1:20.
sentences.chinese: 當孫峯再次回到商店時，已經是次日凌晨1點20分。

definition: very early in the morning/in the wee hours
